original: @107a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @107a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: lo ke shva r'a ya sto tra /
analyzed: lo ke shva r'a ya sto tra /
translated: Lokeshvarastotra

original: bod skad du /üîΩ'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa /
analyzed: bod skad du / 'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa /
translated: In Tibetan:üîΩPraise to the Lord of the World

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord of the World!

original: 'jig rten bla mas gsum gyis phyag byas //
analyzed: 'jig rten bla mas gsum gyis phyag byas //
translated: The world's guru is worshipped by the three:

original: lha dbang tshangs pa ma chog gis bstod pa ste //
analyzed: lha dbang tshangs pa ma chog gis bstod pa ste //
translated: Indra, Brahma, and Vishnu praise him,

original: thub mchog rgyal po myur du dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: thub mchog rgyal po myur du dngos grub stsol //
translated: The supreme sage, the king, quickly grants attainments.

original: spyan ras gzigs mgon mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs mgon mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the supreme protector Avalokiteshvara!

original: bde gshegs rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i ngo bo 'chang //
analyzed: bde gshegs rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i ngo bo 'chang //
translated: The essence of the nectar-like nature of the sugatas,üîΩThe supreme body adorned with various marks,

original: sna tshogs mtshan gyis spras pa'i sku lus mchog / bde gshegs 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: sna tshogs mtshan gyis spras pa'i sku lus mchog / bde gshegs 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can //
translated: The crown of the boundless light of the sugatas,

original: gser gyi padmas g-yon gyi phyag brgyan pa //
analyzed: gser gyi padmas g-yon gyi phyag brgyan pa //
translated: Adorned with a golden lotus in the left hand,

original: dri med ral pa 'khyil nag cung zad ser //
analyzed: dri med ral pa 'khyil nag cung zad ser //
translated: The black coiled hair is slightly yellow and stainless,

original: zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra gsal zhing rdzogs pa'i zhal //
analyzed: zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra gsal zhing rdzogs pa'i zhal //
translated: The face is clear and complete, shaped like the moon,

original: padma ltar yangs mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan //
analyzed: padma ltar yangs mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan //
translated: The eyes are supremely beautiful, wide like lotuses,

original: mkhur ba gangs kyi dum bu lta bur dkar //
analyzed: mkhur ba gangs kyi dum bu lta bur dkar //
translated: The cheeks are white like fragments of snow.

original: ri dvags rgyal po'i dga' bzhin zhal sgros dmar //
analyzed: ri dvags rgyal po'i dga' bzhin zhal sgros dmar //
translated: His face is red like the king of beasts.

original: nyi ma 'char ka ltar dmar btsod kyi mdog /üîΩpadma gzhon nu lta bur mchu dmar la //
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ka ltar dmar btsod kyi mdog / padma gzhon nu lta bur mchu dmar la //
translated: He is red like the rising sun.üîΩHis lips are red like a young lotus.

original: ston ka'i sprin tshogs lta bur sgra sgrogs pa //
analyzed: ston ka'i sprin tshogs lta bur sgra sgrogs pa //
translated: He is as loud as a cloud in autumn.

original: dpung gnyis sna tshogs mtshan gyis mdzes pa ste //
analyzed: dpung gnyis sna tshogs mtshan gyis mdzes pa ste //
translated: His two arms are beautiful with various marks.

original: phyag mthil padma gzhon nu lta bur 'jam //
analyzed: phyag mthil padma gzhon nu lta bur 'jam //
translated: The palms of his hands are soft like a young lotus.

original: ri dvags pags pa sku yi stod na man pas //
analyzed: ri dvags pags pa sku yi stod na man pas //
translated: He wears a deer skin over his upper body.

original: snyan gnyis rna rgyan g-yo zhing mdzes pa mda' //
analyzed: snyan gnyis rna rgyan g-yo zhing mdzes pa mda' //
translated: His two ears are beautiful with moving earrings.

original: phyag ni yangs shing lte ba zab pa ste //
analyzed: phyag ni yangs shing lte ba zab pa ste //
translated: His arms are long and his navel is deep.

original: padma dri ma med pa lta bu lags //üîΩgser mchog sku rags nor bu'i rgyan ldan pa //
analyzed: padma dri ma med pa lta bu lags // gser mchog sku rags nor bu'i rgyan ldan pa //
translated: He is like a stainless lotus.üîΩHe wears a golden belt and jeweled ornaments.

original: na bza' mdzes pas sku yi smad brgyan pa //
analyzed: na bza' mdzes pas sku yi smad brgyan pa //
translated: His lower body is adorned with beautiful clothes.

original: rgyal ba ye shes rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin //
analyzed: rgyal ba ye shes rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin //
translated: The Victorious One has gone to the other shore of the ocean of wisdom.

original: bsod nams du ma las ni 'khrungs pa'i mgon //
analyzed: bsod nams du ma las ni 'khrungs pa'i mgon //
translated: The protector who has arisen from many merits,

original: rims dang nad 'joms bde ba mchog bskyed pa //
analyzed: rims dang nad 'joms bde ba mchog bskyed pa //
translated: The one who conquers fever and disease, the one who produces supreme bliss,

original: srid pa mthar mdzad mkha' la rgyu ba dang // kun tu rgyu ba'i sku mchog la bstod pa //
analyzed: srid pa mthar mdzad mkha' la rgyu ba dang // kun tu rgyu ba'i sku mchog la bstod pa //
translated: I praise your supreme form that moves everywhere.

original: bdud rigs sna tshogs stobs ni nges par 'joms //
analyzed: bdud rigs sna tshogs stobs ni nges par 'joms //
translated: You who have definitely conquered the various demon forces,

original: zhabs mchog rkang gdub mchog gi sgra sgrogs la //
analyzed: zhabs mchog rkang gdub mchog gi sgra sgrogs la //
translated: You whose supreme feet make the sound of supreme anklets,

original: glang po dregs dang ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs //
analyzed: glang po dregs dang ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs //
translated: You who walk with the gait of an arrogant elephant and a goose,

original: bdud rtsi chen po thugs chung yongs rdzogs @107b brnyas //
analyzed: bdud rtsi chen po thugs chung yongs rdzogs @107b brnyas //
translated: You who have attained the great nectar that is completely full,

original: gser bzhin rtag tu dgyes pa'i rgyan mnga' ba //
analyzed: gser bzhin rtag tu dgyes pa'i rgyan mnga' ba //
translated: You who are always adorned with joy like gold,

original: ri bo gru 'dzin ni dgyes par bzhugs //
analyzed: ri bo gru 'dzin ni dgyes par bzhugs //
translated: You who dwell joyfully on Mount Potala,

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug khyed la rab tu bstod //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug khyed la rab tu bstod //
translated: I praise you, Lord of the World.

original: dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The composition by Bhik·π£u·πáƒ´ ≈örƒ´mƒÅt·πõkƒÅ is complete.
